seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' without senior prefix, but requires 3+ years experience and involves complex responsibilities like ETL development, data modeling, and production support

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer', core responsibilities focus on ETL workflows, data warehouse development, and data modeling using Snowflake and DBT

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions Control M batch processing, ETL job development, and data warehouse focus - all indicating batch processing paradigm rather than streaming

leadership_expectation.evidence: Role focuses on individual contributor tasks like ETL development, testing, debugging, and production support with no mention of team leadership or direct reports

primary_cloud.evidence: No specific cloud provider mentioned - only Snowflake (which is cloud-agnostic) and on-premise technologies like Unix are referenced

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned at all in the job posting

processing_paradigm.evidence: Explicitly mentions 'Control M Batch processing' and ETL job builds for production, indicating batch processing focus

orchestrator_category.evidence: Control M is mentioned as batch processing orchestrator, which falls under traditional workflow orchestration category similar to Airflow

storage_layer.evidence: Snowflake is explicitly mentioned as the data warehouse solution, and role is titled 'Data Engineer-Data Warehouse'

remote_restriction.evidence: Specific location requirement for Kochi, Kerala, India indicates regional restriction rather than fully remote

timezone_focus.evidence: Location specified as Kochi, Kerala, India indicates focus on India timezone (IST)

relocation_required.evidence: Role requires being in Kochi, Kerala, India - candidates not already in this location would need to relocate

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned and role is based in India, suggesting no H1B sponsorship for US positions

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support and role requires work authorization without specific student visa accommodation

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirements mentioned, only standard work authorization implied for the location

w2_vs_1099.evidence: IBM Consulting role with full-time responsibilities and benefits structure suggests W2 employment rather than contractor arrangement

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, or other compensation details mentioned in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career progression, growth opportunities, or advancement paths mentioned in the job description

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship programs, senior staff collaboration, or learning from experienced team members mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career growth opportunities mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities mentioned

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks, paths to senior roles, or advancement opportunities mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must-have technical skills listed but Master's degree is preferred rather than required, indicating balanced requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined data engineering role focused on data warehouse ETL development with specific technologies and responsibilities outlined

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills required (3+ years, Snowflake, DBT, SQL, ETL) are appropriate for mid-level data engineer position without unrealistic expectations
